modName: Hovering Idle and Combat Animations - WIP
summary: These animations were designed with the thought of being used with races that could hover/levitate.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[size=6][color=red]MOD PROVIDED AS IS!
NEW ANIMATION SET TO BE RELEASED AT A LATER TIME! [/color][/size]

[youtube]V0-GW_7yiMQ[/youtube][/center]

[size=5][u][b]Description[/b][/u][/size]
These animations were designed with the thought of being used with races that could hover/levitate or even levitating magic.

[size=5][u][b]Installing[/b][/u][/size]

1. Extract the files to the Skyrim data folder or use your mod manager.
2. Verify files were correctly extract to the right location.

[size=5][u][b]Suggested Mods to use with:[/b][/u][/size]

If you only want to apply this animation to your character/race, I suggest the following mods:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14871/?

It is highly suggested you use another mod that alternates the upper body magic animations. If you want results like the video, use the follow:
YY Anim Replacer - Mystic Knight by yukl - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33914/?

[size=5][u][b]Uninstalling[/b][/u][/size]

1.Deletes all associated files from this mod or use mod manager to handle it for you.


[size=5][u][b]Compatibilities & Incompatibilities[/b][/u][/size]

Any mod that modifies the same hkx files are not compatible.


[size=5][u][b]Known Issues[/b][/u][/size]
-Jumpy animations are caused by transition animations not being created


[size=5][u][b]Permission[/b][/u][/size]
As of right now, I do not feel it is ready to be used by other people for other mods. You may message me if you are interested in improve the animations.

[size=5][u][b]Credits[/b][/u][/size]

Bethesda - for making the great sandbox that is Skyrim
author: Khenta
